# Paavli Kultuurivabrik

![Paavli Kultuurivabrik black](/sites/default/files/media/images/2025-10/pk-logo-c-black.svg)

Paavli Culture Factory is a concert and event hall, night club, and cultural centre situated in a repurposed fish factory. With a commitment to a cutting-edge music programme and embracing diversity as a core principle, Paavli Culture Factory has swiftly established itself as one of the most influential live music venues in the Estonian capital. Featuring state-of-the-art lighting and sound infrastructure, along with a reputable and experienced team, the future looks promising for this repurposed space.

## All the events happening at Paavli Kultuurivabrik 2025-2026

Discover all 3 upcoming concerts scheduled in 2025-2026 at Paavli Kultuurivabrik.

Paavli Kultuurivabrik hosts concerts for a wide range of genres from artists such as [MONO](/artists/201140-mono), [Marcos Valle](/artists/5852-marcos-valle), and [Discharge](/artists/374494-discharge), having previously welcomed the likes of [Swans](/artists/132580-swans), [james K](/artists/122327-james-k), and [The Young Gods](/artists/410952-young-gods).

Browse the list of upcoming concerts, and if you can’t find your favourite artist, track them and let Songkick tell you when they are next in your area.
